summary: A rar file containnig customizations of the original SnowFall ENB to make it more natural and fancy looking.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#76a5af][size=3]It is already 2016 and I'm not sure if people still enjoy playing skyrim.
[/size]
If you are tired of too saturated, too bright, too dark, very low contrast, too bloom, too unNatural-lookings of ENB Series for skyrim, this is the guide to make your game visual almost-perfect. This is a balanced customization of visuals for the best natural looking of sunrise, day, sunset and night times of the game scenes.[/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/NStxez1.jpg[/img]

[color=#9fc5e8][size=5]I give credit to ENB Devs and original ShowFall ENB makers (glacier ENB)[/size][/color]

[color=#76a5af] This is not a mod. This is a rar file containing customized visual settings of the SnowFall ENB to make it look a bit fancy still natural. I changed the ambient lights, direct lights, sky, SSAO and other settings to make the game look like the one shown in pictures.
You can also edit the settings yourself by pressing Shift + Enter in game. However I name this customization "Balanced Natural ENB".[/color]

[color=#00ffff]This rar files contains SMAA files too. I took it from realVision ENB.[/color]

[color=#9fc5e8][size=5]I give credit to realVision ENB makers too.[/size][/color]

[color=#e69138][size=4]To look exactly like shown in the pictures, this ENB preset cannot help alone. You will need this graphical setup.[/size][/color]

[color=#a2c4c9]please find the mods yourself on nexus mod[/color]

[color=#f6b26b]//Very important mods[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Skyrim 2K textues[/color]
[color=#00ffff]SIMM[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Enchanced Lights and FX (don't install the weather system)[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Realistic Water two[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Water Color for enb[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Skyrim Partical Patch for ENB[/color]

[color=#f6b26b]//Forest and grass[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Skyrim Flora Overhall[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Logical grass[/color]
[color=#00ffff]JK's skyrim all in one[/color]
[color=#00ffff]city forest and landscape[/color]

[color=#f6b26b]//landscapes - Optional[/color]
[color=#00ffff]AOF detailed mountains[/color]
[color=#00ffff]SkyFalls and skymills[/color]
[color=#00ffff]skyrim highPoly fern meshes[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Skyrim Distance Overhaul[/color]


[color=#6aa84f][size=3]Installation------------------------------------------------------[/size][/color]

[color=#f6b26b][size=3]It is recommanded to remove your previous ENB or Sweet FX files first. Use ENB FXAA Sweet FX Manager (pls search yourself at Nexus mod).[/size][/color]

[color=#76a5af]extract the rar file and copy and paste the files into your skyrim root folder (where TESV.exe exists)[/color]
[color=#76a5af]then in documents/my games/skyrim/skyrimpPrefs.ini[/color]

[color=#76a5af]change these values[/color]

[color=#00ffff]iMultiSample=0
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=1
fGamma=1.0000
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
[/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/K2tv1HL.jpg[/img]
